## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.20G035700](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.20G035700)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmLEC2a</u>
- **Gene Name:** B3 domain-containing transcription factor LEC2
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - **GmLEC2a** regulated the lipid transporter genes and oil body protein gene OLEOSIN (OLE1).
   - **GmLEC2a** Expression in Arabidopsis thaliana Alters Seed Oil Production and TAG Composition.
   - **GmLEC2a** Expression Alters the Starch Concentration of atlec2 Seeds and Leaves.
   - **GmLEC2a** Over-Expression Alters the Total Protein Level in Hairy Roots and Seeds.
   - **GmLEC2a** Controls the Regulation of Lipid Transporters.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [seed](/tags/seed/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[starch](/tags/starch/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[transporter](/tags/transporter/)

## Literature:
   - [Soybean LEC2 Regulates Subsets of Genes Involved in Controlling the Biosynthesis and Catabolism of Seed Storage Substances and Seed Development.]( https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fpls.2017.01604/full)&nbsp;&nbsp;DOI:&nbsp;&nbsp;[10.3389/fpls.2017.01604](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fpls.2017.01604/full);&nbsp;&nbsp;PMID:&nbsp;&nbsp;[28979275](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28979275/)
